What are the genetic changes related to inherited thyroxine-binding globulin deficiency ?,"Inherited thyroxine-binding globulin deficiency results from mutations in the SERPINA7 gene. This gene provides instructions for making thyroxine-binding globulin. Some mutations in the SERPINA7
